short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make as much money as as you can!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple game that is just made to make Make Money look a bit better, and to add features I've personally always wanted. All instructions are in-game, and you literally just click to start off the game. It's that simple!
